name: Down Memory Lane
description:
A short game where a girl needs to go to the store quickly to buy the things she needs! Along the way, you'll get to know the past of the girl through interacting with various things. Your interactions and decisions effect the outcome. Make sure you don't miss anything because you can't go back...

Programmer & Sound Effects - Sugar2000galaxy

Artist, Music & Author - classic-rose (her channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCqkSSb9kzc87H4bK4Vp6GMw)

There are three endings in total that you can get. The average playtime for this game is 10 minutes. If you like the game, please consider donating to support us. If there any bugs that you have experienced in the game, please comment on this page! More updates are also coming in the future...
